Class AsyncConfigsClient: likely an asynchronous client for configuration management. Methods: init, get_config, get_config_deployment_revision, revert_deployment_revision, save_config. So summary: asynchronous client handling configuration retrieval, versioning, saving, and rollback. Business intent: provide non-blocking interface to manage application configurations, support deployment revisions, enable revert and persist changes. Keywords: async, config, client, retrieval, versioning, rollback, save, deployment, revision, non-blocking, API.
